headline: AI stocks weak on word Microsoft drops data center leases in U.S. and Europe
summary: Investing.com -- There are more jitters in the AI sector Wednesday after analysts at TD Cowen highlighted that their channel checks show Microsoft is canceling data center leases in the U.S. and Europe, following up on his earlier finding.

headline: Why AI-Focused Semiconductor Leaders Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing, Broadcom, and Marvell Technology Plunged Today
summary: Shares of most artificial intelligence (AI)-related semiconductor stocks, including Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (NYSE: TSM), Broadcom (NASDAQ: AVGO), and Marvell Technology (NASDAQ: MRVL), were falling hard on Wednesday, down 4.5%, 4.3%, and 6.6%, respectively, as of 12:49 p.m. ET.  Most AI-related hardware stocks, including Nvidia, were down sharply on three bits of news.  One, the U.S. added about 50 Chinese companies and 80 total companies to the export "entity list," which could restrict semiconductor sales globally.

Most AI-related hardware stocks, including Nvidia, were down sharply on three bits of news.  One, the U.S. added about 50 Chinese companies and 80 total companies to the export "entity list," which could restrict semiconductor sales globally.

headline: Why Broadcom (AVGO) Stock Is Falling Today
summary: Shares of fabless chip and software maker Broadcom (NASDAQ:AVGO) fell 5.4% in the afternoon session after stocks pulled back (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.5%) amid fresh concerns about trade tariffs. The pullback followed comments from President Trump clarifying the scope of his administration's 25% tariffs on Venezuela. He noted that it would apply to any country that does business with Venezuela. For example, 25% is on top of the already-in-place 20% tariff on China because China imports oil from

headline: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) Expands AI Optical Interconnects With Sian3 And Sian2M DSPs
summary: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) recently launched new DSP products, emphasizing its commitment to AI and ML applications, which are essential for advanced networking solutions. Despite this innovative move, the company's shares remained flat over the past week, correlating with broader technology sector setbacks, as reflected by major tech declines in Nvidia and Tesla. Similarly, the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite dropped by around 1.9%. Broadcom's stock performance aligns with the sector's cautious...

headline: Why the Sellers Are Wrong About Broadcom (AVGO) Stock
summary: The tech-sector sell-off allows investors to pick up excellent stocks at suddenly significant discounts, with Broadcom (AVGO) being a case in point. The semiconductor giant was one of the market’s hottest stocks for much of 2024, but it has given up a quarter of its value in 2025 and currently stands ~20% lower since the turn of the year. Investors who feel they missed out on Broadcom’s recent success can now buy in at a lower price point. I’m bullish on Broadcom based on its reasonable valuatio

headline: This Top Dividend ETF Is Making Some Major Changes
summary: The Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF (NYSEMKT: SCHD) is one of the largest exchange-traded funds (ETFs) focused on dividend stocks.  The Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF doesn't just invest in any dividend stock.  It focuses on companies with the highest-quality payouts.
